text: Shela Bagh railway station (, Balochi:شیلاباغ ریلوے اسٹیشن) is located in Shela Bagh town, Qilla Abdullah district of Balochistan province of the Pakistan. This railway station is gateway of the famous Khojak tunnel. ==See also== * List of railway stations in Pakistan * Pakistan Railways ==References== ==External links== *Official Web Site of Pakistan Railways Category:Railway stations in Killa Abdullah District Category:Railway stations on Rohri–Chaman Railway Line
title: Shela Bagh railway station
